mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction( user_no, transaction_name, transaction_amount, transaction_date, category_id, sub_category_id, fixed_flg ) VALUES( #{userNo}, #{transactionName}, #{transactionAmount}, #{transactionDate}, #{categoryId}, #{subCategoryId}, #{fixedFlg} );
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM transaction WHERE transaction_id = #{transactionId} AND user_no = #{userNo};
mapper.select: SELECT t.transaction_date, t.transaction_name, t.transaction_amount, t.category_id, c.category_name, t.sub_category_id, sc.sub_category_name, t.fixed_flg FROM transaction t INNER JOIN category c ON c.category_id = t.category_id INNER JOIN sub_category sc ON sc.sub_category_id = t.sub_category_id WHERE t.user_no = #{userNo} AND t.transaction_id = #{transactionId};
